summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Nickerson Street from Third Avenue North to Third Avenue West, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same to a width of fourteen (14) feet; all in accordance with Resolution No. 3636 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
